name: the endless chaos
description:
This is our game we made for the MizJam1  If you have any feedback I'd love to hear about it! (it's endless ).

I used the asset pack is from kenny.nl as people doing the MizJam1 would know.

Lastly this game was made in the unity game engine .

Other than that I hope you enjoy my game :D.

made by ِhmed and Abdulrahman amr and Thanks
